FuncDef: The display system resource usage command displays KPI information. The display system resource usage command displays KPI information.
CLIs: display system resource usage { slot <slotId> [ cpu <cpuID> ] | all }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specify the CPU ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Displays KPI information about all boards.
-

ExtraInfo: When you need to learn the overall running status of the device, run this command to view the key performance indicators (KPIs).
